posts.post_content:
FS - 1910 T206 Tris Speaker - Boston Red Sox Hall of Famer. Sweet Caporal 350, Factory 25 Reverse. SGC 10 with rounded corners, two creases bottom left, paper loss in the bottom left border, and the number 20 written on the middle top of the back.

$325.00 w/ shipping on me. Please PM me with interest. "I'll take it" trumps ongoing negotiations.
